text: if the target branch doesn't move, restarting the job or pushing/closing+reopening is exactly the same

elements.text: if the target branch doesn't move, restarting the job or pushing/closing+reopening is exactly the same

text: not _entirely_ the same because pushing and closing+reopening will generate a new merge commit, which will be formally different from the previous one, but the content of the tree is the exactly same
